loot.name: Time Coins
description: Used in one quest. Can be traded for colonial marks. Randomized hue.

loot.name: Time Vase
description: Can be traded for colonial marks. Randomized hue.

loot.name: Time Reagents
description: Can be traded for colonial marks. Randomized hue.

loot.name: Temporal Imprints
description: Used to create time menageries. These can drop off any monster in the entire dungeon.

loot.name: Blackrock Fragments
description: Used to create time menageries. Not confirmed but likely higher drop rate off Blackrock Elementals.

loot.name: Infinity Coins
description: Exchange these for items at the vendor in Colony.
